ingredients.ingredient: 1 zucchini, cut into spirals using a spiral slicer
1 large carrot, cut into spirals using a spiral slicer
1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, or more to taste
1 tablespoon finely grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste

cookingTips: Use a mandoline or spiral slicer for uniform, professional-looking noodles
Serve immediately after assembling to keep the zucchini crisp
Pat spiralized vegetables dry before mixing to prevent excess moisture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook master the spiral slicer and create a light, fresh vegetable salad with proper emulsification of the vinaigrette.
